meanings.sent1: She felt clueless about the math problem and couldn't solve it.
meanings.sent2: He seemed clueless about the new rules at work.
meanings.sent3: The clueless puppy tried to chase its own tail.
meanings.sent4: In the maze of life, he wandered clueless, searching for direction.
meanings.sent5: The student's clueless expression showed he had no idea what was happening.

meanings.sent1: The clueless tourist got lost in the city.
meanings.sent2: She was clueless about the surprise party being planned for her.
meanings.sent3: The clueless driver accidentally turned into a one-way street.
meanings.sent4: Lost in the sea of information, he felt clueless and overwhelmed.
meanings.sent5: His clueless behavior made it obvious he had no clue about the situation.
